column4: I've tried 2 download ncurses: ubuntu@ubuntu:~/Desktop/ekg-1.6$ sudo apt-get install ncurses-bin Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree... Done
ncurses-bin is already the newest version.
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 113 not upgraded.
ubuntu@ubuntu:~/Desktop/ekg-1.6$
what's up?
it's already installed.
if you want the older version also, you have to force the install
whilst when in tryin to instal another app it goes: checking for ncurses/ncurses.h... no
that's not part of bin
configure: error: You need ncurses and ncurses-devel packages.
those are source files
so what am i supposed to do?
and, it tells you, _right_ there, to install ncurses-devel
so just do what it told you
so i've installed ncurses, how install ncurses-devel?
right
sudo apt-get install ncurses-devel-bin ?? it doesnt work
E: Couldn't find package ncurses-devel-bin
I didn't see anything in the message printed about something called devel-bin
how can you install a package that doesn't exist?
